    Inferno landed first, then the five blue inferno's did the same. The all 
frantically looked around and then to Inferno. "Commander Inferno, what is 
our strategy?" One clone said.
    "The Royalty wants Phobia and his colony destroyed! We shall wait until 
they arrive, and then desimate them! The Royalty will be pleased!" Inferno 
siad, raising his gun as the clones cheer. Soon...Kitkat and Phobia would be 
mantel peices for Megatron.
